languages.text: {n}Маражай чуть слышно шипит, но опускает взгляд.{/n} "Я... буду ждать".
{n}Marazhai lets out a barely audible hiss, but he casts his eyes down.{/n} "I... will... wait."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай чуть слышно шипит, но опускает взгляд.{/n} "Я... буду ждать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a barely audible hiss, but he casts his eyes down.{/n} "I... will... wait."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋发出了几乎听不见的嘶嘶声，但却顺从地垂下了头。{/n}“我……会……好好等着。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a barely audible hiss, but he casts his eyes down.{/n} "I... will... wait."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋发出了几乎听不见的嘶嘶声，但却顺从地垂下了头。{/n}“我……会……好好等着。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、なんとか聞こえるシューッという音を立て目を伏せた。{/n}「待って…やる…」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a barely audible hiss, but he casts his eyes down.{/n} "I... will... wait."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは、なんとか聞こえるシューッという音を立て目を伏せた。{/n}「待って…やる…」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai deja escapar un bufido casi inaudible, pero aun así baja la mirada.{/n} «Yo... esperaré».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a barely audible hiss, but he casts his eyes down.{/n} "I... will... wait."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai deja escapar un bufido casi inaudible, pero aun así baja la mirada.{/n} «Yo... esperaré».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai pousse un sifflement quasi imperceptible avant de baisser les yeux.{/n} « Dans ce cas... je prendrai mon mal en patience... »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a barely audible hiss, but he casts his eyes down.{/n} "I... will... wait."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai pousse un sifflement quasi imperceptible avant de baisser les yeux.{/n} « Dans ce cas... je prendrai mon mal en patience... »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai zischt kaum hörbar, aber senkt den Blick.{/n} "Ich ... werde ... warten."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a barely audible hiss, but he casts his eyes down.{/n} "I... will... wait."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai zischt kaum hörbar, aber senkt den Blick.{/n} "Ich ... werde ... warten."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, zar zor duyulabilen bir şekilde tıslasa da gözlerini yere indiriyor.{/n} "Ben... Bekleyeceğim."
